/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. A few buildings and cars can be seen in the distance, adding elements of urban life to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
